definition.description:
* This Number should be generated by the code in non-decimal format.
* Should be unique - no numbers should be repeated for any of the integrations.
* Should be greater than Zero and start in 4 digits and increment by the starting value value.

* This Number should be generated by the code in decimal format with 2 precision values
* The Values can be repeated. 
* The Value can be in Both Positive and Negative (Negative should not be generated unless stated under specific condition)
definition.note: If there is a Tax line generated, then the amount generated for the tax line should be 20% of the Header Amount and remaining 80% should be in line amount.
definition.example: Header Amount = $1000, then the Line Amount = $800 and Tax Amount = $200.

definition.description:
* This Value should be generated in a Date Format in DD-MON-YYYY.
* The Date should be in any of the past date in the current system month. Previous month should be populated only if specifically mentioned.

* When a field is mentioned as Lookup, then this needs to be populated from a pre defined value from the lookup table.
* Lookup- Multiple mean, there could be more than onle value populated in the same field for different records.
definition.example: Business Unit if given as 'BU1' and 'BU2' in the lookup table, then record 1 should be BU1 and record 2 should have BU2 and so on.

definition.description:
* When a field is mentioned as Lookup, then this needs to be populated from a pre defined value from the lookup table.
* Lookup- Single mean, there could be only one value populated in the same field for all records.
* When a field is mentioned as System Generated Varchar, then this needs to be populated with mix of NUMBERS and CHARS.

header.conditional_validations: When the INVOICE TYPE is STANDARD, then populate the Invocie number with prefix as STD and if it is CREDIT MEMO, then populate it with prefix as CM
When invoice type is STANDARD, populate the amount in positive greater than zero. When it is CREDIT MEMO populate it as negative less than zero
Any Date in the current month preferrably today's date or yesterday's date
For the transactions with BUsiness unit as 'CTS India' then populate Invoice currency as 'INR' and BUsiness unit as 'CTS UK' then populate Invoice currency as 'GBP'

line.conditional_validations: should be same as INVOICE ID from header
Should be unique within same INVOICE ID. Start from 1 and increase the number within the same INVOICE ID.

When invoice type is STANDARD, populate the amount in positive greater than zero. When it is CREDIT MEMO populate it as negative less than zero.
When LINE TYPE = ITEM, the Amount should be populated with 80% of the AP_INVOICES_INTERFACE's INVOICE AMOUNT. if LINE TYPE = TAX, then Amount should be populated with 20% of the AP_INVOICES_INTERFACE's INVOICE AMOUNT.
Additional validation is sum of both ITEM and TAX amount should be equal to header INVOICE AMOUNT.
Populate this value only for the line with LINE TYPE = TAX, Leave null for LINE TYPE = ITEM
